Introduction

The Pink Lady was a five-member project girl group under OD Entertainment. They debuted on February 20, 2019 with the single "God Girl".

They are described as a popsical group, a combination of K-pop and musical.

They are presumed to have disbanded in late 2019 due to inactivity on their social media platforms.
